sense.def:
Dan, teden ali leto, ki je
following
, sledi tistemu, ki smo ga pravkar omenili.

seg.quote: She intended to come on the following Friday.

sense.def:
Following a particular event
pomeni po nekem dogodku.

seg.quote: ...the election of Harold Wilson to the leadership following Gaitskell's death.

sense.def:
The following things
so stvari, ki jih bomo vsak hip omenili.

seg.quote: This could be achieved in the following way.

sense.def:
Kadar ima oseba ali organizacija
a following
, ima skupino oseb, ki zagovarjajo njena prepričanja ali dejanja.
